page.title: 11Health Care in Strathmiglo
page.content: Strathmiglo is well known as a centre for alternative medicine.The Westbank Healing and Teaching Centre was founded by Bruce Macmanaway and his wife Patricia in 1959.Mr Macmanaway's special studies include evidence for survival of death,the development of E.S.P. faculties,spinal and joint correction,release of trapped nerves,relief of muscle tension,and dowsing.He lectures throughout Britain and abroad.He has often been interviewed on television and radio and by the press.He is the author of the book _"Healing _ the energy that can restore health." He is the vice_president of the British Society of Dowsers and has previously been a council member of the College of Psychic Studies and the National Federation of Spiritual Healers.
